active_trend.name: y2k revival
active_trend.description: Oh, darling, let me take you on a blast to the past with the 'Y2K revival' trend! This early 2000s-inspired style is all about embracing bold colors, futuristic designs, and unapologetic bling. Think low-rise jeans, crop tops, platform shoes, and mini shoulder bags – it's like Paris Hilton and Britney Spears are still ruling the scene!

past_trends.name: y2k
past_trends.description: Oh, darling, let's blast off to the past! Y2K fashion, short for "Year 2000," is a playful and nostalgic trend that draws inspiration from the late 90s and early 2000s. Think low-rise jeans, crop tops, platform shoes, and mini skirts, all wrapped up in a colorful and shiny package with a healthy dose of logomania and futuristic design elements – it's like a fashion party that never ended!
